sections.heading: I, II, III, or IV school district; secretary; books, records, and reports; duty to preserve
sections.text: The secretary of a Class I, II, III, or IV school district shall (1) record all proceedings of the district in a book furnished by the district to be kept for that purpose, (2) preserve copies of all reports,

sections.heading: is custodian of records. George v. School Dist. No. 24 of Red Willow County, 157 Neb. 791, 61 N.W.2d 401 (1953).
sections.text: is custodian of records. George v. School Dist. No. 24 of Red Willow County, 157 Neb. 791, 61 N.W.2d 401 (1953).
